snippet: It is unclear how the thousands of veterans who are in college are faring; only last month, the Department of Veterans Affairs announced a partnership with the National Student Clearinghouse and the Student Veterans of America to analyze data with an...
abstract: It is unclear how the thousands of veterans who are in college are faring; only last month, the Department of Veterans Affairs announced a partnership with the National Student Clearinghouse and the Student Veterans of America to analyze data with an eye to determining if the veterans are succeeding -- or failing -- and why.

headline.main: Veterans in College: Share Your Stories

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: United States Defense and Military Forces
